metadata.Title: CVE-2022-45407 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description: If an attacker loaded a font using FontFace() on a background worker, a use-after-free could have occurred, leading to a potentially exploitable crash. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 107.

notes.Note: tyhicks> mozjs contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine mdeslaur> starting with Ubuntu 22.04, the firefox package is just a script that installs the Firefox snap

criterions.comment: mozjs52 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs68 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
